tokens.text: "  by @Jonovono - Add comments to files or directories.\n\n"
"  c all to list all the files with their comments.\n"
"  c all (+ or -) to list all the files in ascending or descending order.\n"
"  c <filename> to view that files comment if there is one.\n"
"  c <filename> \"comment\" give the entered file the entered comment\n"
"  c <filename> -p \"{comment}\" to append comment to that files comment.\n"
"  Replace <filename> with . to do the commands on the current directory.\n\n"
